message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand that $120 is a bit tight for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $160 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $140?
I'm getting closer to your budget, Bob! I can do $155, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I'm getting close to making a decision, but $155 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $145?
I'm not going to give up on this deal yet, Bob! I can meet you at $150, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a fair price for a great product, and I think you'll really appreciate it.
I'm really close to making a decision, but $150 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $140?
I'm not going to budge on the price, Bob. I can do $145, but that's my final offer. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I'm sorry, but $145 is still above my budget. I think I'm going to have to pass on this deal. I appreciate your time and effort, but I'll have to look elsewhere.
